body.content:
Greetings in the name of Lord

 My name is Mrs. Renate Magdalena Settnik I am a German Citizen, I'm a
67
 years old widow living in Burkina Faso, I am married to Late Mr.
Richard
 Frankfurt Settnik, a Refinery Engineer and a Crude Oil dealer here in
 Burkina Faso; He was killed during the Burkina Faso Political unrest
that
 happened 6 years ago in August 2016, Due to his death, that brought
upon me
 a severe health challenge of FULL-BODY PARALYSIS I am writing you this
 message with the help of a nurse here, the worst of it all i have been
 bedwelting for the past three years, I inherited the sum of 25 million
Euro
 from my late husband of which with the help of Reverend Father Philip
 Michael I have given donations to over 10 Charity Organizations and
 Foundations, in Africa, Asia, South America, at this moment I have the
 balance deposit sum of Ten million Euros 10, 000,000.00.Euro, in one of
the
 prime bank here in Burkina Faso which i want to entrust on you for
charity
 project

 I need your urgent answer to know if you will be able to execute this
 project in your country for the less privilege to enable me you more
 information on how the fund will be transferred to your bank account.

 Yours dying sister
 Mrs. Renate Magdalena Settnik
